function.description: Render an SVG file to a PNG image using Inkscape CLI, with optional size and background controls.
function.name: media.render_svg_to_png

background.description: Background colour as hex (e.g. '#FFFFFF'). Default is transparent.

dpi.description: Export DPI. Defaults to Inkscape's default of 96.

height.description: Export height in pixels. Width scales proportionally if omitted.

output_path.description: Path for the output PNG file. Defaults to the input path with a .png extension.

svg_path.description: Path to the input SVG file.

width.description: Export width in pixels. Height scales proportionally if omitted.
